text: Eugeniusz Stanislaw Lewacki (born 24 January 1926) is a Polish former ice hockey center and Olympian. Lewacki played for Poland at the 1948 Winter Olympics and 1952 Winter Olympics. He also played for KTH Krynica and Gwardia Bydgoszcz in the Polish Hockey League.Society for International Hockey Research Database, retrieved June 29, 2015 ==References== Category:1926 births Category:Ice hockey players at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Ice hockey players at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:KTH Krynica players Category:Living people Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Poland Category:Polish ice hockey centres Category:Sportspeople from Kraków
title: Eugeniusz Lewacki
